example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Meanwhile, stations are fuming because, many of them say, the show's distributor, Viacom Inc., is giving an ultimatum: Either sign new long-term commitments to buy future episodes or risk losing ``Cosby'' to a competitor.
example.arg: because, many of them say, the show's distributor, Viacom Inc., is giving an ultimatum: Either sign new long-term commitments to buy future episodes or risk losing ``Cosby'' to a competitor.

example.name: with source of anger
example.text: The direct-mail industry, not surprisingly, is fuming at the injustice of it all.
example.arg: at the injustice of it all.
